text: Kirill Aleksandrovich Tolmatsky (; 22 July 1983 – 3 February 2019Агент назвал причину смерти Децла ), better known by his stage name Detsl and nickname Doshirak (Russian: Децл), was a Russian hip hop artist. In 2000, he released his debut album Who? You to massive success and quickly became a teen idol of the early 2000s in Russia.Путь Децла: от «Вечеринки» до борьбы с мировым заговором In 2001, his second album Street Fighter was released. He died on 3 February 2019 in Izhevsk at the age of 35 from a sudden heart attack after performing his live set at the private birthday party. In a 2007 interview, Detsl talked about faking his own death at the exact same age while performing at a concert in the same city he would actually die in. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Russian singers
title: Detsl
